markdownRemark.html:
Character Controller

The Character Controller package is a robust system for controlling character movement in Unity games. The package supports endless character configurations through 20+ highly customizable modules edited from a single component.

Features

  • Sprinting
  • Walking
  • Jumping
  • Crouching
  • Dodging
  • Dashing
  • Jetpack
  • No Clip
  • Stamina System
  • Character Animation
  • Full IK Solution
  • Ragdolls
  • Platform Movement
  • Rigidbody Push
  • Fall Recovery
  • Fall Damage
  • Edge Slip

ðŸ“¥ Namespace

Import the package namespace in each script or file you want to use it. You may need to regenerate project files/assemblies first.

using Zigurous.CharacterController;
